Player History
Had first career hit on 5/28/1985, off Rick Sutcliffe (CHC)...
Traded from Cincinnati to Chicago on 4/11/1986 (Going to CIN: 2B Ryne Sandberg. Going to CHC: P Andy Ashby, P Ron Robinson)...
Earned first career win on 4/25/1988...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 5/1/1988, going 2-0, 0.44...
2/2/1989: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,352,857 through salary arbitration...
2/2/1990: Gets a new one-year contract worth $3,328,571 through salary arbitration...
2/2/1991: Gets a new one-year contract worth $3,328,571 through salary arbitration...
Signed as a free agent by Kansas City on 2/7/1992 to a 3-year deal worth $4,000,000 per year...
